title: Creative Skills
description: As a web designer, I possess a diverse set of skills and expertise to bring your web design visions to life

skills.title: Web Design Principles
skills.description: Proficiency in the fundamental principles of design, such as layout, color theory, typography, and visual hierarchy.

skills.title: User Interface - UI Design
skills.description: Ability to create visually appealing and intuitive user interfaces that enhance user experience and engagement.

skills.title: User Experience - UX Design
skills.description: Understanding of user behavior and psychology to design seamless and enjoyable user experiences that meet user needs and goals.

skills.title: Responsive Web Design
skills.description: Knowledge of designing websites that adapt and function seamlessly across various devices and screen sizes.

skills.title: Wireframing and Prototyping
skills.description: Ability to create wireframes and interactive prototypes to visualize and test website layouts and functionality.

skills.title: Mobile-Friendly Optimization
skills.description: Proficiency in the fundamental principles of design, such as layout, color theory, typography, and visual hierarchy.
